description: This authentic family restaurant situated in a quiet mountain village with just a few inhabitants serves delicious home-made cuisine. The owner-chef here delights guests with his decidedly Tuscan dishes full of intense flavours and prepared mainly from produce grown in the restaurant’s kitchen garden. His generous offerings include proverbial recipes such asfried egg with leaves and flowersand his classicpigeon with herbs, all seasoned with olive oil produced on the property from Seggiano olives. Excellent wine list, plus thoughtful recommendations to accompany your meal.
